name: discharge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.black-white: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.
